vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐνδῐδύσκω,
put on, τινά τι [LXX+NT]:—middle, put on oneself, [NT+1st c.AD+]
__II clothe, τινὰ ἱματίῳ [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to put on, dress (another); (middle) dress oneself
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to put on, dress (another); (middle) dress oneself
a later form, equivalent to ἐνδύω, to dress (oneself), Mark 15:17; 16:19*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: vestir o arropar de ; vestirse de (voz media)
